page.title: 11Some of Kington's Clubs
page.content: There are about 70 clubs often held at different times so that it is possible to join a variety. Here are some - The Football Club, which is also open every night for drinking, on Thursday nights for darts and on Saturdays there is live entertainment. The Golf Club, which also has other social activities. The Dolphins Swimming Club which goes every Friday night to Leominster pool. The Army Cadets which is very popular with teenage boys. The Hockey Club The Cricket Club. Weight Training. Tennis Club. Youth Club. St. John's Ambulance. Guides and Brownies.
